description: Good starter trail that any beginner can do including kids. Good mix of gravel, small rocks, tarmac, forested and open areas, under and over bridges. Interesting enough to keep beginners' interest.Gentle slopes except for a short uphill on tarmac next to sports fields.Includes a bike terrain park for honing skills.Start and end at North Vancouver MEC/Park & Tilford
directions: Start at North Vancouver Mountain Equipment Coop (buy something) or at Park & Tilford. Cycle northwards from there
title: MEC-South Richard Juryn
